thread.title: Stronger Dollar Weighs on Gold

author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Stronger Dollar Weighs on Gold
text:
Gold prices inched lower Monday, weighed down by a stronger dollar.
Front-month gold for January delivery fell 0.1% to $1,318.60 a troy ounce on the Comex division of the New York Mercantile Exchange. Prices had risen in 11 straight sessions and 15 of the last 16 trading days entering Monday, boosted by the dollarâ€™s recent declines.
A weaker...
